name: A Letter Arrives
description:
Dear %ENTHRALLED_NAME,

Thank you for taking time to respond to me. I hope we can work together to defeat this evil, which threatens us all. In these uncertain times, we don't know who to trust, so I am glad to have found an ally of repute and reliability.

Your friend,
%PERSON_NAME

choices.name: 'Our enemies are legion, and we cannot trust anyone. You should remain vigilant at all times'
choices.description:
Slowly begin to erode %PERSON_NAME's trust in others, beginning the task of driving them into isolation and madness over future events.

-Starts the madness event sub-chain

-50% chance to cause a point of sanity loss immediately

outcomes.description: %PERSON_NAME loses a point of sanity, paranoid and fearful, checking for unseen enemies everywhere, unable to sleep.

choices.name: 'Our bonds of trust and friendship are all that protect us from the shadow'
choices.description:
Begins building up %PERSON_NAME's trust in your enthralled, boosting their liking and political support for you in future events.

-Starts the friendship event sub-chain

-50% chance to gain 10 liking immediately

outcomes.description: %PERSON_NAME trusts your enthralled noble, and gains 10 liking towards them.
